languages.text: "Я слышала ваш разговор с расхитительницей священных мест моих предков. Мой ответ — нет. Никогда я не стану ей помогать, покуда звезды над головой не погаснут, а небо не станет землей под моими ногами".

traits.locale_text: "Я слышала ваш разговор с расхитительницей священных мест моих предков. Мой ответ — кшер'ман тар'ри-кхо. Никогда я не стану ей помогать, покуда звезды над головой не погаснут, а небо не станет землей под моими ногами".

languages.text: "I heard your conversation with the ransacker of the sacred places of my ancestors. My answer is no. I will not help her, not as long as the stars overhead still glitter, and not before the sky above becomes the land underneath my feet."
languages.original_text: "Я слышала ваш разговор с расхитительницей священных мест моих предков. Мой ответ — нет. Никогда я не стану ей помогать, покуда звезды над головой не погаснут, а небо не станет землей под моими ногами".

traits.locale_text: "I heard your conversation with the ransacker of the sacred places of my ancestors. My answer is: ksher'man tar'ri-kho. I will not her, not as long as the stars overhead still glitter, and not before the sky above becomes the land underneath my feet."

"I heard your conversation with the ransacker of the sacred places of my ancestors. My answer is: ksher'man tar'ri-kho. I will not her, not as long as the stars overhead still glitter, and not before the sky above becomes the land underneath my feet."

"I heard your conversation with the ransacker of the sacred places of my ancestors. My answer is: ksher'man tar'ri-kho. I will not her, not as long as the stars overhead still glitter, and not before the sky above becomes the land underneath my feet."

"I heard your conversation with the ransacker of the sacred places of my ancestors. My answer is: ksher'man tar'ri-kho. I will not her, not as long as the stars overhead still glitter, and not before the sky above becomes the land underneath my feet."

languages.text: “你和那位洗劫了我的先祖圣地的人一直在交谈，我也听到了你们的谈话。我的回答是：克舍儿-曼恩-塔利-科霍——我绝不。只要群星还在闪闪发光，只要头顶上的天空还没有变成脚下的大地，我就绝不会答应。”
languages.original_text: "I heard your conversation with the ransacker of the sacred places of my ancestors. My answer is: ksher'man tar'ri-kho. I will not her, not as long as the stars overhead still glitter, and not before the sky above becomes the land underneath my feet."

traits.locale_text: “你和那位洗劫了我的先祖圣地的人一直在交谈，我也听到了你们的谈话。我的回答是：克舍儿-曼恩-塔利-科霍——我绝不。只要群星还在闪闪发光，只要头顶上的天空还没有变成脚下的大地，我就绝不会答应。”
“你和那位洗劫了我的先祖圣地的人一直在交谈，我也听到了你们的谈话。我的回答是：克舍儿-曼恩-塔利-科霍——我绝不。只要群星还在闪闪发光，只要头顶上的天空还没有变成脚下的大地，我就绝不会答应。”

languages.text: «He oído tu conversación con la saqueadora de los santuarios sagrados de mis ancestros. Mi respuesta es no. No la ayudaré hasta que las estrellas dejen de brillar y el cielo se convierta en el suelo bajo mis pies».
languages.original_text: "I heard your conversation with the ransacker of the sacred places of my ancestors. My answer is no. I will not help her, not as long as the stars overhead still glitter, and not before the sky above becomes the land underneath my feet."

traits.locale_text: «He oído tu conversación con la saqueadora de los santuarios sagrados de mis ancestros. Mi respuesta es no. No la ayudaré hasta que las estrellas dejen de brillar y el cielo se convierta en el suelo bajo mis pies».

languages.text: 「私の父祖の聖地を荒らした者とあなたとの会話を聞いた。天に星が輝く限り、また空が大地にならない限り、私はあの者に手を貸すつもりはない。」
languages.original_text: "I heard your conversation with the ransacker of the sacred places of my ancestors. My answer is no. I will not help her, not as long as the stars overhead still glitter, and not before the sky above becomes the land underneath my feet."

traits.locale_text: 「私の父祖の聖地を荒らした者とあなたとの会話を聞いた。私の答えはこうだ、コシャーマン・タリコー。天に星が輝く限り、また空が大地にならない限り、私はあの者に手を貸すつもりはない。」

languages.text: « J'ai entendu votre conversation avec la profanatrice des sanctuaires sacrés de mes ancêtres. Ma réponse est non. Jamais je ne lui prêterai main-forte, pas tant que les étoiles brilleront au-dessus de nous et que la voûte céleste ne nous sera pas tombée sur la tête. »
languages.original_text: "I heard your conversation with the ransacker of the sacred places of my ancestors. My answer is no. I will not help her, not as long as the stars overhead still glitter, and not before the sky above becomes the land underneath my feet."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai entendu votre conversation avec la profanatrice des sanctuaires sacrés de mes ancêtres. Ma réponse est non. Jamais je ne lui prêterai main-forte, pas tant que les étoiles brilleront au-dessus de nous et que la voûte céleste ne nous sera pas tombée sur la tête. »

languages.text: "Ich habe Euer Gespräch mit dem Plünderer der heiligen Stätten meiner Vorfahren gehört. Meine Antwort lautet: Ksher'man tar'ri-kho. Ich werde es nicht tun, nicht solange die Sterne über uns noch leuchten, und nicht eher, bis der Himmel zum Boden unter meinen Füßen wird."
languages.original_text: "I heard your conversation with the ransacker of the sacred places of my ancestors. My answer is: ksher'man tar'ri-kho. I will not her, not as long as the stars overhead still glitter, and not before the sky above becomes the land underneath my feet."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Euer Gespräch mit dem Plünderer der heiligen Stätten meiner Vorfahren gehört. Meine Antwort lautet: Ksher'man tar'ri-kho. Ich werde es nicht tun, nicht solange die Sterne über uns noch leuchten, und nicht eher, bis der Himmel zum Boden unter meinen Füßen wird."

"Ich habe Euer Gespräch mit dem Plünderer der heiligen Stätten meiner Vorfahren gehört. Meine Antwort lautet: Ksher'man tar'ri-kho. Ich werde es nicht tun, nicht solange die Sterne über uns noch leuchten, und nicht eher, bis der Himmel zum Boden unter meinen Füßen wird."

languages.text: "Atalarımın kutsal mekânlarını soyan kadınla konuştuklarınızı duydum. Cevabım net: Hayır, yardım etmeyeceğim. Gökte yıldızlar parladıkça ve gökyüzüyle yeryüzü yer değiştirmedikçe katiyen olmaz."
languages.original_text: "I heard your conversation with the ransacker of the sacred places of my ancestors. My answer is no. I will not help her, not as long as the stars overhead still glitter, and not before the sky above becomes the land underneath my feet."

traits.locale_text: "Atalarımın kutsal mekânlarını soyan kadınla konuştuklarınızı duydum. Cevabım net: Hayır, yardım etmeyeceğim. Gökte yıldızlar parladıkça ve gökyüzüyle yeryüzü yer değiştirmedikçe katiyen olmaz."
